metadata.title: CVE-2024-38631 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:iio: adc: PAC1934: fix accessing out of bounds array indexFix accessing out of bounds array index for averagecurrent and voltage measurements. The device itself hasonly 4 channels, but in sysfs there are "fake"channels for the average voltages and currents too.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
